userTable:
CREATE TABLE `user` (
`id`  int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'user\'s id, unique' ,
`name`  char(31) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'a cute girl' COMMENT 'user name, editable' ,
`email`  varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '\'e-mail, use for notification\'' ,
`password`  varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL ,
`sex`  tinyint(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`avatar`  varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NULL DEFAULT '/static/image/default.png' ,
`settings`  int NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'foreign key for mongodb' ,
PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
)
ENGINE=InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC
;
